# Setup

```shell
python3 -m venv venv
. ./venv/bin/activate
python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt
```

# Usage

```shell
. ./venv/bin/activate
python3 main.py
```

# Jupyter Notebooks

You can find some Jupyter notebooks containing plots of the data under `notebooks/`.

Simply run the following to see them:

```shell
. ./venv/bin/activate
jupyter-lab
```
